titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for a generall and publike thanksgiuing to almighty God, for his great mercy in staying his hand, and asswaging the late fearefull visitation of the plague.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at White-Hall, the tvvo and tvventieth day of Ianuary, in the first yeere of his Maiesties Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.

person.persName: Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie
